mapper.sql: serial_code, name, use_type, store_id, coupon_type, reached_amount, minus_amount, reduce_amount, discount, create_time, create_id, effective_time, expiration_time, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_coupon
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_coupon (serial_code, name, use_type, store_id, coupon_type, reached_amount, minus_amount, reduce_amount, discount, create_time, create_id, effective_time, expiration_time, remark) values (#{serialCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{couponType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{reachedAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{minusAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{reduceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_coupon
serial_code,
name,
use_type,
store_id,
coupon_type,
reached_amount,
minus_amount,
reduce_amount,
discount,
create_time,
create_id,
effective_time,
expiration_time,
remark,

mapper.update:
update t_coupon
serial_code = #{record.serialCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_type = #{record.useType,jdbcType=CHAR},
store_id = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=CHAR},
coupon_type = #{record.couponType,jdbcType=CHAR},
reached_amount = #{record.reachedAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
minus_amount = #{record.minusAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
reduce_amount = #{record.reduceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
discount = #{record.discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_id = #{record.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_time = #{record.effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiration_time = #{record.expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_coupon set serial_code = #{record.serialCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_type = #{record.useType,jdbcType=CHAR}, store_id = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=CHAR}, coupon_type = #{record.couponType,jdbcType=CHAR}, reached_amount = #{record.reachedAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, minus_amount = #{record.minusAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, reduce_amount = #{record.reduceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount = #{record.discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_id = #{record.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective_time = #{record.effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiration_time = #{record.expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_coupon
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=CHAR},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=CHAR},
coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=CHAR},
reached_amount = #{reachedAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
minus_amount = #{minusAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
reduce_amount = #{reduceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where serial_code = #{serialCode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update t_coupon set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=CHAR}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=CHAR}, coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=CHAR}, reached_amount = #{reachedAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, minus_amount = #{minusAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, reduce_amount = #{reduceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where serial_code = #{serialCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
